mapper.select: select ls.loanstatus_seq, ls.money, ls.start_date, ls.end_date, ls.type, ls.max_money, ls.loan_interestrate, ls.interestrate, ls.loan_seq, ls.member_seq, l.name, l.type as loanType from tblloanstatus ls inner join tblloan l on l.loan_seq = ls.loan_seq where member_seq = #{memberSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBLLOANSTATUS (LOANSTATUS_SEQ, MONEY, START_DATE, END_DATE, LOAN_INTERESTRATE, TYPE, INTERESTRATE, MAX_MONEY, MEMBER_SEQ, LOAN_SEQ) VALUES (seqLoanStatus.nextVal, #{money}, to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{loanInterestrate}, #{type}, #{interestrate}, #{maxMoney}, #{memberSeq}, #{loanSeq})
mapper.select: select bb.bank_book_seq, bb.bank_book_product_seq, bb.account_number, bb.join_date, bb.maturity_date, bb.balance, bb.member_seq, bbp.name, bbp.sim_info, bbp.type, bbp.info, bbp.join_info, bbp.join_date_info, bbp.join_fee from tblbankbook bb inner join tblbankbookproduct bbp on bb.bank_book_product_seq = bbp.bank_book_product_seq where bb.member_seq = #{userseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbldepositwithdrawal (DEPOSIT_WITHDRAWAL_SEQ, BANK_BOOK_SEQ, DEPOSIT_WITHDRAWA_AMOUNT, DW_DATE) VALUES (DEPOSIT_WITHDRAWAL_SEQ.nextVal, #{bankBookSeq}, #{depositWithdrawaAmount}, to_date(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
